topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ef19ed6368724b47530100#post_53ef19ed6368724b47530100
[bq="Whatevs"]"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ef09fc6368720a72320200#post_53ef09fc6368720a72320200
Is he the Gendo of that series? Madoka is compared to eva so it's an apt question. [/bq]
Not even fucking close.  Kyubey is the single biggest cock-blocker of all of anime.  Gendo is a jackass that couldn't deal with his wife's death so he committed genocide.  Eva-01; the soul inside, I forget what her name is the mom of the main character, was Gendo's wife that he intentionally put in there and then couldn't live without her.

Kyubey is all like, "make humans into soylent green cause that's logical".

Kyubey's a jackass in that even though his theories are constantly disproven he keeps pulling the "lol humans are illogical so I'm right" card.  He's the equivalent of those people that go around constantly pointing out any and all logical flaws in any argument and then argue that everyone, the entire human race, if anyone at any point make any sort of logical flaw in any argument that means the entire human race is automatically wrong about everything and that they're automatically right about everything which in of itself is a logical flaw.  He's the equivalent of if someone went "Oh so 'because a apple gets pulled down to earth at a force of 9.8m/s everything else gets pulled down at the same force'?  Lol, logical flaw all of everything every human has ever said is invalid therefore electricity runs on magic because all humans have ever said is invalid because one person used a logical flaw therefore I'm the only person that can ever be correct about anything forever".  I wouldn't necessarily call him "evil" in the traditional sense; more of the snide jackass sort that treats anyone and everyone like they're inferior to him and thus are nothing more than cattle to him sort of jackass.

No offense to Evangelion fans but why do fans think everything and anything is just a ripoff of Evangelion?  I doubt that Harry Potter or such is a ripoff of Evangelion.


Tl:dr; Kyubey's the sort of jackass that at the end of Madoka's third movie audiences were cheering when he got the shit beaten out of him.
